
# apt-sources-list


## Config File Path

| Config File Path |
| --- |
| [/etc/apt/sources.list](./asset/overlay/etc/apt/sources.list) |


## Debian Package

| Debian Package |
| --- |
| [apt](https://packages.debian.org/sid/apt) |


## Howto


### install

``` sh
$ ./install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make install
```


### package-install

``` sh
$ ./package-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make package-install
```


### config-install

``` sh
$ ./config-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make config-install
```
